about_the_game:
Evil Dark is a first-person survival horror game where light is your only defense. Lurking in the dark are terrifying creatures waiting to strike. Your goal? Survive until dawn—or take the ultimate risk and perform a dangerous ritual to banish the evil for good.



Every game drops you into a new, randomly generated map, full of eerie locations and deadly surprises. Explore dark, hand-crafted environments while managing your light sources carefully. Monsters lurk in the darkening shadows, so keeping the lights on is your only way to stay safe. Run out of light, and you’ll be left at the mercy of the evil lurking in the darkness. So make your choice, will you survive the night—or let the darkness take you?



  • Light is Life: Stay in the light to keep monsters away, but resources like fuel and candles are limited.
  • Two Ways to Win: Make it to dawn by surviving the night, or perform a high-stakes ritual to destroy the evil once and for all.
  • New Challenges Every Game: Each play through gives you a randomly picked map from a list of handcrafted ones and randomly generated item locations, keeping every experience fresh & challenging.
  • Atmospheric Horror: Suspenseful sound design and chilling visuals create an unforgettable horror experience, jumpscares are limited and psychology is used as the main source of horror.
  • Survival Gameplay: Conserve your stamina and manage your light carefully to stay alive.
  • A Dark Story to Uncover: Piece together the mystery of a black magic ritual gone wrong that unleashed unspeakable horrors into the world.



I’m a solo developer pouring everything I’ve got into Evil Dark. Your feedback is incredibly important to me, so please share your thoughts and ideas. Thank you for being part of this journey!

content_descriptors.notes: This game is meant to scare you, those who are afraid of horror or jumpscares should not play this game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (3.2 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 (4 GB VRAM) or AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card with support for DirectX-compatible audio.
  • VR Support: Not supported.
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended alongside stereo speakers or headphones.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intell Core i5-9600K (3.7 GHz) or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super (6 GB VRAM) or AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card with support for DirectX-compatible audio.
  • VR Support: Not supported.
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended alongside stereo speakers or headphones.
